title: Effective price ceiling gone, hourly pay down

content.prompt: If the government eliminates an effective minimum wage in a competitive labor market, which of the following is true?

choices.label: Minimum wage workers will experience no change in hourly pay.
Minimum wage workers will experience a decrease in hourly pay.
The number of people employed will decrease because people do not want to work for low wages.
There will be an excess demand for workers.
There will be an increase in the supply of workers.

topic.text: 2.8: The Effects of Government Intervention in Markets

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
